abstract: Bill Cunningham captures New Yorkers, male and female, carrying 'it bag' of summer, molded rubber bag designed by Robert Verdi and Great Bag Co, in wide variety of vibrant primary colors.
lead_paragraph: A molded rubber bag, designed by Robert Verdi and the Great Bag Co., mixes style details from the Birkin and Kelly bags from Hermès and is a hit of the summer.
snippet: A molded rubber bag, designed by Robert Verdi and the Great Bag Co., mixes style details from the Birkin and Kelly bags from Hermès and is a hit of the summer.
